content: Sporting event delegation **[Singapore](/wiki/Singapore)** competed at the **[2019 Summer Universiade](/wiki/2019_Summer_Universiade)** in Naples, Italy held from 3 to 14 July 2019. The country won one bronze medal, in sailing. ## Medal summary ### Medal by sports Medals by sport[Sailing](/wiki/Sailing_at_the_2019_Summer_Universiade)001**1**Total0011 ### Medalists MedalNameSportEventDate BronzeScott Lan Jillian Lee Tan Jen-e Cheryl Teo[Sailing](/wiki/Sailing_at_the_2019_Summer_Universiade)Match raceJuly 12 - Official website This article about sports in Singapore is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Singapore at the 2019 Summer Universiade
